RESOURCE.NAME: GENIA Sentence Splitter
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A processing resource that takes document and corpus parameters

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation set in which Sentence annotations will be created

PARAMETER.NAME: splitterBinary
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the URL of the GENIA sentence splitter binary

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: if true then debugging info is reported

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
